summary.para: Defines an explicit piecewise curve made up of linear segments, directly defining DSP behavior with respect to normalized distance.

remarks.para: Windows 10 (XAudio2.9); Windows 8, Windows Phone 8 (XAudio 2.8); DirectX SDK (XAudio 2.7)

summary.para: array. The array must have no duplicates and be sorted in ascending order with respect to distance.
Number of distance curve points. There must be two or more points since all curves must have at least two endpoints defining values at 0.0f and 1.0f normalized distance, respectively.
